title: Jack Dorsey's Block Inc. Begins Layoffs Under Previously Disclosed Plan to Cut Staff by 10%
description: The company plans to drastically reduce its headcount throughout 2024 through a series of layoffs and reorganizing measures.

title: Gas-Free Ethereum Games? Animoca Brands and Layer-2 LightLink Team Up
description: The Sandbox and Anichess publisher Animoca Brands aims to bring LightLink’s gasless tech into its Ethereum games.

title: Ethereum Founder Vitalik Buterin Says AI Can Be Like "A Player in a Game" for Crypto
description: Vitalik Buterin explores four ways AI can benefit the blockchain, some of which he says are more risky than others.

title: USDC supply surge as Circle’s expands native issuance to Celo for better payments
description:
Circle’s USD Coin (USDC) stablecoin has expanded to the Celo Network to enhance cross-border payments and peer-to-peer transactions. The Celo Foundation, in a Jan. 30 statement shared with CryptoSlate, highlighted the potential of this expansion to facilitate local currency conversions seamlessly. “USDC joins [Celo’s] ecosystem stablecoin use cases, including remittances, savings, lending, aid disbursement, peer-to-peer […]

The post USDC supply surge as Circle’s expands native issuance to Celo for better payments appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: Bitcoin is following its past price cycles’ movements: Glassnode
description: The current Bitcoin (BTC) price cycle is rhyming with the past three instances, according to a report published today by on-chain analysis firm Glassnode.

title: Super Bowl 58 Wagers Heat up — 49ers Lead as Crypto Betting Markets Favor Their Victory
description: In just under two weeks, the National Football League (NFL) champions of the American Football Conference (AFC), the Kansas City Chiefs, and their counterparts from the National Football Conference (NFC), the San Francisco 49ers, will clash in the much-anticipated Super Bowl 58. title: Standard Chartered foresees Ethereum ETF approval by May 23
description: Geoffrey Kendrick of Standard Chartered Bank predicts the SEC's approval of U.S. Ethereum ETFs by May 23.

title: January’s 5 biggest crypto hacks earn criminals $39m
description: Nearly $50 million was stolen from web3 platforms in the year’s first month as crypto remains engaged in a cyber war with hackers and scammers.

title: Binance Labs Bets on Puffer Finance: A New Chapter in Ethereum Restaking
description: Binance Labs invests in Puffer Finance for the development of its Layer 2 network and promotion of the pufETH token. Puffer Finance, backed by Binance Labs, focuses on liquid Ethereum restaking and security solutions for validators. Binance Labs, the venture capital arm of cryptocurrency exchange giant Binance, has announced a strategic investment in Puffer Finance, [...]

title: Vitalik Buterin Vision: Bringing Artificial Intelligence and Blockchain together for a Technological Future
description: Buterin suggests AI in predictive blockchain markets, improving applications with efficient analytics and low operational cost. He proposes AI as a user interface to simplify blockchain interactions, assisting in understanding and verifying transactions. Vitalik Buterin’s vision of the confluence of artificial intelligence (AI) and blockchain technology suggests a technological revolution, where these two forces converge [...]

title: IOTA’s Focus on Government Adoption, EVM Launch, and Staking Drives Accelerated Growth
description: IOTA has scheduled its EVM launch for March this year to introduce smart contracts and staking rewards on the Shimmer network to revitalize growth and adoption. It will expand IOTA’s Layer 1 capabilities, boosting liquidity by integrating with EVM-compatible dApps and creating a robust and interoperable ecosystem.
